text: @realDonaldTrump #Americans want to know “who got the #COVIDrelief money” be transparent~ it’s taxpayers money helping #Americans we need proof it IS going to Americans in need. Show us the books. #COVID19 #COVID19Pandemic 114,000 #SmallBusiness #CorporateGreed
